# NOtifications

A list of resources to improve your attention span and remind yourself that the devices you use are tools and you should treat them accordingly:

  • Take control - Center for Humane Technology
  • How a handful of tech companies control billions of minds every day - Tristan Harris
  • Quit social media - Dr. Cal Newport
  • Keep your head up: How smartphone addiction kills manners and moods - Adam Popescu
  • The Dangers Of Social Media Addiction - Simon Sinek
  • Pushing Through Frustration: Why I’m Getting Rid of My Phone - Joshua Fields Millburn
  • Reprogramming the Twitch - Joshua Fields Millburn
